content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (x=53.0, y=-83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=53.0, y=-83.0) extracting coal and depositing into a Wooden Chest at position (x=52.5, y=-84.5).

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (x=-20.0, y=-70.0) and another Furnace at position (x=-18.0, y=-70.0), both with no ingredients to smelt.
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-20.5, y=-66.5) waiting for source items, connected to a transport belt system.
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-16.5, y=-64.5) storing iron plates.

### Copper Ore Mining and Transport System
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-23.0, y=-68.0) extracting copper ore and depositing into a Wooden Chest at position (x=-23.5, y=-69.5).
- Transport Belt system connecting the mining drill to various positions, including (x=-24.5, y=-69.5), (x=-22.5, y=-69.5), and (x=-21.5, y=-69.5).

### Iron Ore Mining and Storage Facility at Position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0) extracting iron ore and depositing into a Wooden Chest at position (x=-12.5, y=-54.5).
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-13.5, y=-54.5) waiting for source items.

### Additional Storage and Transport Systems
- Multiple Wooden Chests at various positions storing different resources.
- Several BeltGroups connecting various parts of the map, facilitating the movement of items between structures.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### No Copper Ore on the Belt
- Ensure that the copper ore mining drill is operational and connected to the belt system to transport copper ore effectively.

### Furnaces with No Ingredients to Smelt
- Regularly check and supply the necessary ingredients to furnaces to maintain continuous production.

### Inserters Waiting for Source Items
- Verify that the source items are available and accessible to inserters to prevent idle time and ensure efficient operation.
